formatted_address: 820 Thomson Rd, #02-81 St Anne Mother & Child Centre, Singapore 574623
name: Ark Dermatology Singapore

reviews.text: Dr Shanna Ng was very professional and knowledgeable in treating my son’s allergy symptom on his face. After seeing Drs at Kkh , my son’s face getting worst the next day. Hence we decided to seek Dr Shanna’s help. My son’s face was back to normal on the next day after seeing her. We are glad that miracle happened with the help of this wonderful dermatologist.

vicinity: 820 Thomson Road, #02-81 St Anne Mother & Child Centre
